title: AnoyyedOx
author: AnoyyedOx
content: I was going to mine antpool till I read what mikeywith said so what pool should I really mine? (For Doge or LTE)https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5469489.0

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: I think the Viabtc pool is the best option where to mine Doge and LTC unless the LTE you said above is a different coin? ViaBTC also has merge mining meaning while you are mining LTC you can also get rewarded with Dogecoin which is available in the PPLNS method.If you want to know more about merge mining check this link below- https://support.viabtc.com/hc/en-us/articles/7207416775951-What-is-Merged-Mining

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: AnoyyedOx on February 24, 2024, 02:25:19 PMI was going to mine antpool till I read what mikeywith said so what pool should I really mine? (For Doge or LTE)https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5469489.0mine viabtc below is my referral linkhttps://www.viabtc.com/signup?refer=257609you can us my referralor just go to https://www.viabtc.comsign up and mine ltc/doge mergedalso this thread should be moved to https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=199.0that is the alt coin mining pool section

comments.author: mikeywith
comments.body: KYC is not the only reason why to avoid antpool, there fee structure is scammy at best, while their FPPS fee is normal (4% which is the norm today), their PPLNS fee is sold as "free" when in fact, they keep 100% of the fee rewards, so in most cases, you end up paying a lot more fees than mining on another PPLNS pool, so be careful when you chose your payout method, never do PPLNS with Antpool.

comments.author: AnoyyedOx
comments.body: Quote from: mikeywith on February 26, 2024, 08:51:16 PMKYC is not the only reason why to avoid antpool, there fee structure is scammy at best, while their FPPS fee is normal (4% which is the norm today), their PPLNS fee is sold as "free" when in fact, they keep 100% of the fee rewards, so in most cases, you end up paying a lot more fees than mining on another PPLNS pool, so be careful when you chose your payout method, never do PPLNS with Antpool.What pool do you mine?
